resources.string: Items must be returned within 30 days of purchase. Items must be in their original condition, unused, and with all tags attached. Refunds will be issued in the original form of payment. Shipping and handling fees are non-refundable. Some items may be non-returnable or subject to specific return conditions. Please contact customer support for further assistance with returns.\n\nNote: This is a general return policy. Specific return policies may vary depending on the retailer or product.
